name: Lauterbrunnen Valley
real: A hidden valley in Switzerland that inspired Rivendell.
mythic: Home of the Elves in Middle-earth, nestled between waterfalls.

name: Jungfrau Massif
real: Tolkien climbed here in 1911; inspired the Misty Mountains.
mythic: Vast snow-capped peaks dividing lands of elves and dwarves.

name: Aletsch Glacier
real: Switzerland's largest glacier; Tolkien crossed it on foot.
mythic: Echoes the frozen north of Middle-earth, realm of the Forodwaith.

name: Zermatt / Matterhorn
real: Iconic alpine peak, symbolizing endurance and solitude.
mythic: Likened to Erebor, the Lonely Mountain in The Hobbit.

name: Grimsel Pass
real: High alpine pass Tolkien descended during his 1911 trip.
mythic: Resembles the Fellowship's dangerous mountain crossings.
